title: Lorell 13201 Led Desk Task Light, 8W, Silver
features: Feature-packed lighting with 3 levels of brightness.
Store your smartphone in the front.
USB port in the base for convenient recharging.
description: Feature-packed lighting with 3 levels of brightness Store your smartphone in the front USB port in the base for convenient recharging 8-watt SMD LED for plenty of light Manufacturer Lorell Manufacturer Part Number 13201 Brand Name Lorell Product Name Smart Device Slot/USB Task Light Marketing Information Versatile task light focuses the right amount of light just where you need it and offers a smart device slot and USB charging port (at rear of lamp base) to keep up with your fast-paced schedule. Shade bends up to 180 degrees. The lower hinge can bend forward. Light is generated by 8-watt SMD LED module that is irreplaceable. Dimming switch offers three levels of light as well as an on/off function. LED Task Light is made of aluminum and plastic. It includes a DC adapter and a power cord almost 6' long. Lamp is for indoor use only.
